Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform

Class Section

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform.Section
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Section extends Object implements Serializable
Contains all data, methods, and formatting information of a Section within an Evaluation. Can be serialized for storage in a database.
Author:
Logan Racer

    • getMaxColumns

      public int getMaxColumns()
      Returns the number of columns for Questions that should appear in the Section.
      Returns:
      maxColumns - Max number of question columns in the Section.

    • getRowClass

      public String getRowClass()
      Returns the appropriate class name for column formatting using HTML Bootstrap. Determines the column layout of the Section.
      Returns:
      classString - String which can be used as an HTML element class attribute.

    • hasDropdownQuestions

      public boolean hasDropdownQuestions()
      Checks all Questions in the Section for 'DROPDOWN' type.
      Returns:
      boolean - True if Section has any 'DROPDOWN' questions.

    • getSectionMaxPoints

      public int getSectionMaxPoints()
      Checks all score-able Questions in the Section and calculates the maximum possible points for the Section.
      Returns:
      maxPoints - Max score possible for the Section

    • getSectionEarnedPoints

      public int getSectionEarnedPoints()
      Checks all score-able Questions in the Section and calculates the total points earned in the Section.
      Returns:
      earnedPoints - Total earned points for the Section

    • getSectionScore

      public double getSectionScore()
      Calculates the score earned in each Section.
      Returns:
      sectionScore - Score of the section

    • processSecToolTip

      public List<String> processSecToolTip()
      Updates appropriate strings in the Section and Questions with HTML formatting information for displaying tooltips on the Evaluation.
      Returns:
      warnings - List of Warnings encountered while processing the tooltips.
